Experience

With a beautiful setting on the outskirts of Arusha on Tanzania’s largest coffee plantation, Arusha Coffee Lodge boasts a luxurious historic atmosphere & glorious views of towering Mount Meru.
The lodge is located just 5 minutes from Arusha Airport & the ideal stopover before or after a Tanzania safari.
Arusha Coffee Lodge’s guests can enjoy relaxing strolls along the rows of lush-green plantations or taste fresh coffee from their on-site coffee shop or patisserie.

Stay

There are 18 plantation rooms & 12 plantation suites at Arusha Coffee Lodge.
The plantation rooms are comfortably furnished & nestled among the aromatic coffee trees. Each room features an en-suite bathroom with a shower & bath, an in-room log fire & a veranda offering beautiful views over the surrounding green coffee garden.
Providing a modern yet homely retreat among the coffee trees, the plantation suites include en-suite bathrooms with rainfall showers, lavish bathtubs & private terraces with log fires.
The lodge’s main area features an outdoor restaurant for al fresco dining, a bar, swimming pool & wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.

Activities

Activities at Arusha Coffee Lodge are ample!
They include the “Bean-to-Cup coffee estate tour & the trader’s walk which is a collection of 5 boutique shops & gourmet food places within the ground of Arusha Coffee Lodge showcasing some of the country’s best creativity.
Others include day trips to Arusha National Park or Arusha Town or getting pampered in the on-site wellness spa.

subfolders.title: Arusha Coffee Lodge
subfolders.description: With a beautiful setting on the outskirts of Arusha on Tanzania’s largest coffee plantation, Arusha Coffee Lodge boasts a luxurious historic atmosphere & glorious views of towering Mount Meru. The lodge is located just 5 minutes from Arusha Airport & the ideal stopover before or after a Tanzania safari.

subfolders.title: Hamerkop House by Lemala
subfolders.description: Hamerkop House by Lemala is a 3-bedroom villa situated on the private Kilimanjaro Golf & Wildlife Estate, halfway between Kilimanjaro International Airport & Arusha. Small & intimate, complete with experienced chefs, a private airstrip, swimming pool & spa – the villa is an ideal choice for discerning travellers looking for a luxurious escape before or after a Tanzania safari.

subfolders.title: Hatari Lodge
subfolders.description: Located at the slopes of Mount Meru in Arusha National Park’s Ngurdoto Crater – also known as a ‘little Serengeti’ – Hatari Lodge boasts eclectic décor, spectacular wildlife viewing & a range of exciting safari activities. The nearby Momela Lakes are home to a variety of wildlife, including waterfowls, lazy hippos, black-&-white colobus monkeys & pink flamingos.

subfolders.title: Kili Villa
subfolders.description: Kili Villa comprises 3 exclusive use, fully staffed retreats situated within a spectacular golf & wildlife estate in Arusha. Kili Villa has become the discerning traveller’s start & end to their safari adventure & can be reached by private airstrip or a 30-minute transfer from Arusha & Kilimanjaro Airports.

subfolders.title: Legendary Lodge
subfolders.description: Legendary Lodge boasts a beautiful setting on a fragrant working coffee farm among lush tropical gardens on the outskirts of Arusha. This tranquil retreat offers a home-away-from-home experience, sublime cuisine & exceptional service.

subfolders.title: Machweo Wellness Retreat
subfolders.description: Perched on Namasi Hill in a beautiful estate’s lush gardens, Machweo Wellness Retreat is a luxury boutique hotel with an ideal location on the outskirts of Arusha – Tanzania’s gateway to the Northern safari circuit. This luxurious boutique hotel is a private sanctuary to the discerning traveller hoping to escape the hustle & bustle before or after a Tanzania safari.

subfolders.title: Shu'Mata Camp
subfolders.description: Set on a craggy hill at the foot of Mount Kilimanjaro in the heart of the Maasai Steppe, Shu’Mata Camp is an intimate safari haven, offering awe-inspiring views of the south Amboseli savanna & Africa’s highest mountain. Shu’Mata means ‘heaven’ in the local Maa language - & aptly so – because it is so close to Kilimanjaro that on a clear night, guests might see details of its glaciers at the summit, which is the highest in all of Africa.

whatWeLoveItems: Ideal overnight stay – 5 minutes from Arusha Airport
Beautiful setting surrounded by coffee plantations
Taste fresh coffee from the on-site coffee shop
